name: CupertinoTabBar
desc: An iOS-styled bottom navigation tab bar.

fields.name: items
fields.desc: The interactive items laid out within the bottom navigation bar.

fields.name: onTap
fields.desc: The callback that is called when a item is tapped.

fields.name: currentIndex
fields.desc: The index into [items] of the current active item.

fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.desc: The background color of the tab bar. If it contains transparency, the tab bar will automatically produce a blurring effect to the content behind it.

fields.name: activeColor
fields.desc: The foreground color of the icon and title for the [BottomNavigationBarItem] of the selected tab.

fields.name: inactiveColor
fields.desc: The foreground color of the icon and title for the [BottomNavigationBarItem]s in the unselected state.

fields.name: iconSize
fields.desc: The size of all of the [BottomNavigationBarItem] icons.
